name: Dog Cat Daycare
description:
It's raining dogs and cats at the daycare! Touch, drag, and drop the dogs in the dogs pen and the cats in the cats pen, but be careful not to place the wrong animal on the wrong pen - a fight might break out! Feed the animals some food to calm them down. Make sure to act quick - if any are left injured, the game will end!

Play between three modes, unlock achievements, and try to reach a personal high score!
